Invocation Name: airplane sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
🛫 WHY CHOOSE RELAXING AIRPLANE SOUNDS: 🛫
🌀 Enjoy 5 hours of continuous, soothing airplane ambiance for FREE! 🌀
🔊 Immerse yourself in premium quality stereo audio, designed for ultimate relaxation. 🎧

If you enjoy this Airplane Sound Skill, do not miss our other tranquil offerings:
🌟 Relaxing Sleep Sounds: Ocean Sounds
🌟 Relaxing Sleep Sounds: Rain Sounds
🌟 Relaxing Sleep Sounds: White Noise
🌟 Relaxing Sleep Sounds: Pink Noise
🌟 Relaxing Sleep Sounds: Brown Noise

Explore our diverse range of skills:
🧠 Memory Challenge
🦖 Escape Jurassic Island
🤣 Dad Jokes
🏛️ State Capital Trivia

Unwind, relax, and embark on a journey with us! 🌴

🌟 GOLD EDITION 🌟

We love for an enhanced relaxation experience:
- Enjoy loop-free audio that plays throughout the entire night.
- Experience seamless audio transitions, starting with the soothing ocean sounds and gently transitioning to the tranquil sounds of birds chirping in a peaceful German forest. (Plus, explore other wake sounds!)
- Immerse yourself in premium sound quality for the ultimate relaxation.
- Super Enhanced Looping: Enjoy 10-hour audio sessions for uninterrupted tranquility.

Discover a new level of relaxation with the GOLD EDITION.


FREE VERSION INCLUDES:
- 5 hour audio
- High quality stereo audio
- Unlimited looping and unlimited devices
- Only tells you about the paid version once, never bugs you again

SETTING UP A ROUNTINE
1. On the Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" then Select Relaxing Sleep Sounds: Airplane Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine then press SAVE.

ROUTINE EXAMPLES
For example, you can say "Alexa, good night" to start the routine. If you set "when this happens" to "Alexa, good night".

You can also set a time for the routine to start. For example, you can set the routine to start at 10:00 PM every day.

I hope you enjoy this Alexa skill!
priv:
